bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Terminology and Test Methods of Digital-to-Analog Converter Devices
IEEE Standard for Terminology and Test Methods of Digital-to-Analog Converter Devices

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terminology and test methods to clearly document prevalent world-wide terms used to describe and test digital-to-analog converters (DACs) are provided. It is restricted to monolithic, hybrid, and module DACs and does not cover systems encompassing DACs.

Terminology and test methods to clearly document prevalent world-wide terms used to describe and test digital-to-analog converters (DACs) are provided. It is restricted to monolithic, hybrid, and module DACs and does not cover systems encompassing DACs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
